x_spi_netcdf_name.description: field name for NETCDF files without spaces

x_spi_platform_code.description: used a primary key by EMODNet Physics. Standard format for SPI datasets: seadatanetplatformID_expeditioncode_primaryDOIsuffix

x_spi_platform_name.description: name of platform on which data package was collected, specifically for EMODNet Physics

x_spi_type.description: type of platform on which data package was collected, specifically for EMODNet Physics

x_spi_citation.description: full citation of dataset (usually taken as a copy from Zenodo), specifically for EMODNet Physics
x_spi_citation.example: Benavent, N., Garcia-Nieto, D., Cuevas, C.A. and Saiz-Lopez, A. (2020). Iodine monoxide (IO) measurements made using a MAX-DOAS (Multi-Axis Differential Optical Absorption Spectroscopy) instrument in the austral summer of 2016/17 during the Antarctic Circumnavigation Expedition (ACE). (Version 1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3843376

x_spi_cf_standard_name.description: equivalent CF standard variable name, specifically for EMODNet Physics

x_spi_cf_unit.description: corresponding CF standard variable unit, specifically for EMODNet Physics

x_spi_cf_attribute.description: description of variable in relation to corresponding CF standard variable, specifically for EMODNet Physics
x_spi_cf_attribute.example: Longitude at which trace metal rosette deployment began

x_spi_additional_organisation.description: organisation represented by the contributor, in addition to the one listed in the organisation field

x_spi_additional_organisations.description: array of organisations represented by the contributor, in addition to the one listed in the organisation field

x_spi_additional_email.description: contact email address of a contributor, in addition to the one listed in the email field

x_spi_additional_emails.description: array of contact email addresses of a contributor, in addition to the one listed in the email field
